topics: Purpose of prayer and alignment with God's will
Baptism theology and its role in salvation
Christian Zionism and Israel covenant theology
Biblical canon and inspiration of the Apocrypha
Spiritual warfare, anxiety, and spiritual disciplines
bibleStories: The Parable of the Rich Man and Lazarus
sentimentFlow: The Q&A session starts light and cheerful with holiday greetings, gratitude in prayer, and reassuring answers to fears about Satan, prayer, and depression. It maintains an steady, empathetic, and encouraging tone while tackling heavier topics like hell, sin, and forgiveness, always pivoting to hope, God's love, and practical comfort. Rather than a heavy-to-light arc, it remains predominantly uplifting, ending with positive advice on anxiety, relationships, and devotionals before a grateful closing prayer.
